com.mobius.vdrapi.command
Interface ICommand

All Known Implementing Classes:
com.mobius.vdrapi.command.PromptingCommandBase
public interface ICommand

A class implements ICommand to signify that it is a command object.

Command objects represent actions that can occur as objects, such as finding pages, getting pages, locating nodes, and downloading groups of pages. You can record command objects to a script for playback, similar to the script commands found in DocumentDirect.

You can pass command objects around like other objects. They can be destroyed, created, saved to disk, copied, and reused.

Nested Class Summary
static class ICommand.KeyValuePair
          Represents key value pairs used as parameters to the load(java.util.Vector) function.

Method Detail

execute

public void execute()
             throws CommandNotLoadedException,
                    CallbackException,
                    ViewDirectException
Executes the command.

Throws:
CommandNotLoadedException - thrown if load(java.util.Vector) has not been called yet.
CallbackException - thrown if problem occurs using one of the callback interfaces needed.
ViewDirectException - thrown if any other problem occurs.

getKeyValuePairs

public Vector getKeyValuePairs()
Returns the list of key value pairs passed to the Load function.

Returns:
vector of ICommand.KeyValuePair objects

getType

public com.mobius.vdrapi.command.CommandType getType()
Returns the type of this command.

Returns:
the type of the command.

load

public void load(Vector keyValuePairs)
          throws CallbackException,
                 ViewDirectException,
                 ParsingException
Loads the parameters for this command. Throws exceptions if problems occur when loading.

Throws:
CallbackException - thrown if a callback is needed for loading, but there is a problem using it.
ParsingException - thrown if there is an error when parsing the key value pairs.
ViewDirectException - thrown if any other error occurs.
